name: HiGoal_SmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on "kitchen"”
”Alexa, turn off "kitchen"”
”Alexa, execute "good night"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control of the smart home system, through voice commands.
Combining HIGOAL capabilities with ALEXA Skill.
The Skill is suitable for working with HIGOAL smart products.
You must connect to Skill with the user name and password of the app.
